alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grant and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Malvern, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malvern... Poyen... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Thiel... Donaldson... Lono... Fenter... Brush Creek... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas.
